page.title: 20Primary Schools - Paignton
page.content: {School Meals Service} Hayes Road Primary School has its own school kitchen which serves around 200 meals every day. There is a Cook in Charge and three Kitchen Assistants who prepare the meals. On the 18th June 1985 the cooks prepared the following menu:- Battered fish and chips, peas, sausages,creamed potatoes, beef burgers, sweetcorn and fish fingers. The sweet courses offered were:- Assorted biscuits, pineapple surprise, jam tart, fruit and Angel Delight. {Credits} Children in the 4th, 3rd, and 2nd Years of the school have all contributed to the Domesday Project. Hayes Road County Primary School July 1985.
